attributes.action: Pay nothing to the EU and walk away, others will leave as EU will be insolvent.
attributes.background: We voted to leave in the referendum, to allow us to control our borders and trade with the faster growing world economys saving £ billions on clothes, food and shoes, to offset other losses. We can't trade from inside the customs union. The EU is failing, we must get out before they take us down too

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
